name: Buck
text: l~aA yas~am~aEuwna <ilaY {lomala<i {lo>aEolaY` wayuqo*afuwna min kul~i jaAnibK

name: Buck
text: fa{sotafotihimo >ahumo >a$ad~u xaloqFA >am m~ano xalaqonaA^ <in~aA xalaqona`hum m~in TiynK l~aAzibK]

name: Buck
text: fa<in~amaA hiYa zajorapN wa`HidapN fa<i*aA humo yanZuruwna

name: Buck
text: wamaA kaAna lanaA Ealayokum m~in suloTa`nK] balo kuntumo qawomFA Ta`giyna

name: Buck
text: laA fiyhaA gawolN walaA humo EanohaA yunzafuwna

name: Buck
text: qaAla qaA^}ilN m~inohumo <in~iY kaAna liY qariynN

name: Buck
text: vum~a <in~a lahumo EalayohaA la$awobFA m~ino HamiymK

name: Buck
text: falam~aA balaga maEahu {ls~aEoYa qaAla ya`bunaY~a <in~iY^ >araY` fiY {lomanaAmi >an~iY^ >a*obaHuka fa{nZuro maA*aA taraY` qaAla ya`^>abati {foEalo maA tu&omaru satajiduniY^ <in $aA^'a {ll~ahu mina {lS~a`biriyna

name: Buck
text: waba`rakonaA Ealayohi waEalaY`^ <isoHa`qa wamin *ur~iy~atihimaA muHosinN waZaAlimN l~inafosihi. mubiynN

name: Buck
text: wajaEaluwA@ bayonahu, wabayona {lojin~api nasabFA walaqado Ealimati {lojin~apu <in~ahumo lamuHoDaruwna
